name: Shade (Fezumlix)
description:
Standalone Version recommended for better Performance!

 

Follow Shade - a creature from the Darkness - fight his way into the Light. Shade needs to overcome Barriers and purge himself from the Darkness to become a Creature of Light.

 

Controls

  • WASD / Arrow Buttons => Movement
  • Left Mouse Button => Shoot

 

Credits

Programming/Design:

  • Fezumlix

This Game was developed for the Mini Jam 103: Darkness
